snippet.title: Engineered To Purpose  - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Determine the fate of all of existence in Engineered to Purpose, the flagship title of Indy studio Confidence Roll Games. Engineered to Purpose is a retro-futuristic tower defense game that balances strategic play with a rich narrative. The game launches on PC in Early Access on March 12, please wishlist us on Steam here: 

 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2199780/Engineered_To_Purpose/
